name: TappyPlane
description:
I created this game as a way to become familiar with Game Maker. I wanted to make a game quickly that would allow me to learn the Game Maker interface and how to make a game from start to finish with Game Maker. I was inspired by all the great entries in the Flappy Jam to do my own Flappy Bird clone.

If you try out my game I'd love for your feedback. Find me on twitter @Zymatic.

Graphics created by Kenney.

Music created by Sound Jay.
